commit.message:
alpha.c (alpha_emit_xfloating_compare): Use CCmode instead of COMPARE for the EQUIV expression.

        * config/alpha/alpha.c (alpha_emit_xfloating_compare): Use CCmode
        instead of COMPARE for the EQUIV expression.
